name: CareConnect-MedicationDosageAdditionalInstructions-1-Extension

element.definition: Additional instructions such as "Swallow with plenty of water" which may or may not be coded.

binding.description: Codes identifying additional instructions such as "take with water" or "avoid operating heavy machinery".
